root.name: Williams Arcade Classics
root.description: OverviewWilliams Arcade Classics was a compendium of six of Williams' best games from their hey-days in the arcades. It featured:JoustRobotronDefenderDefender 2SinistarBubblesThe game featured highscores, unlimited lives/continues, and commentary videos that featured the original programmers.Version DifferencesSome versions excluded Bubbles due to memory constraints. The Nintendo 64 version replaced Defender 2 and Bubbles with Spy Hunter and Root Beer Tapper.
